languages.text: "Ритуалов ухаживаний высокородных господ мне не понять, но я вижу определенную красоту в том, как все строго подчинено регламенту".
languages.translation_comment:
Romance with Cassia started.
Heinrix: "Curtsies, eloquent glances, even an immortalium... It has been a long time since I saw anyone observe the aristocratic rules of courtship. And so devotedly at that."

traits.locale_text: "Ритуалов ухаживаний высокородных господ мне не понять, но я вижу определенную красоту в том, как все строго подчинено регламенту".

languages.text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."
languages.translation_comment:
Romance with Cassia started.
Heinrix: "Curtsies, eloquent glances, even an immortalium... It has been a long time since I saw anyone observe the aristocratic rules of courtship. And so devotedly at that."
languages.original_text: "Ритуалов ухаживаний высокородных господ мне не понять, но я вижу определенную красоту в том, как все строго подчинено регламенту".

traits.locale_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."
"I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."
"I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."
"I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."
"I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."
"I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."

languages.text: 「貴族たちの儀礼というものは、私には一生理解できないかもしれません。だが、すべてが厳格な手順に従って動くということには、ある種の美しさを感じます」
languages.original_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."

traits.locale_text: 「貴族たちの儀礼というものは、私には一生理解できないかもしれません。だが、すべてが厳格な手順に従って動くということには、ある種の美しさを感じます」

languages.text: "Ich werde die Rituale von hochwohlgeborenen Lords und Ladys wohl nie verstehen, aber ich erkenne doch eine gewisse Schönheit darin, dass alles einem strikten Protokoll folgt."
languages.original_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Rituale von hochwohlgeborenen Lords und Ladys wohl nie verstehen, aber ich erkenne doch eine gewisse Schönheit darin, dass alles einem strikten Protokoll folgt."

languages.text: « Je crois que je ne comprendrai jamais les rituels des seigneurs et des dames de haute extraction, mais je vois une certaine beauté dans les protocoles qu'ils s'imposent de suivre à la lettre. »
languages.original_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."

traits.locale_text: « Je crois que je ne comprendrai jamais les rituels des seigneurs et des dames de haute extraction, mais je vois une certaine beauté dans les protocoles qu'ils s'imposent de suivre à la lettre. »

languages.text: «Nunca entenderé los rituales de los señores y damas de alta cuna, pero aprecio una cierta belleza en todo lo que implique un protocolo estricto».
languages.original_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca entenderé los rituales de los señores y damas de alta cuna, pero aprecio una cierta belleza en todo lo que implique un protocolo estricto».

languages.text: “或许我永远都无法理解贵族老爷、女士之间的仪式，但我看到了严格遵守礼仪的美感。”
languages.original_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."

traits.locale_text: “或许我永远都无法理解贵族老爷、女士之间的仪式，但我看到了严格遵守礼仪的美感。”

languages.text: "Asillerin ayinlerini asla anlamıyorum ama protokole sıkı sıkıya bağlı kalmanın kendine has bir güzelliği var."
languages.original_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."

traits.locale_text: "Asillerin ayinlerini asla anlamıyorum ama protokole sıkı sıkıya bağlı kalmanın kendine has bir güzelliği var."

languages.original_text: "I may never understand the rituals of highborn lords and ladies, but I see a certain beauty in everything following strict protocol."
